about_the_game: The world is riddled with monsters. The people need a hero and you need to serve them ale. You are a tavern barkeep and heroes are thirsty. Collect special ingredients to make ale for them, give them unique weapons from the blacksmith, organize the heroes into parties, and send them on quests. If they survive you might gain a little reputation and the ability to attract more patrons. Returning patrons will have become stronger and can be sent on more difficult quests.

content_descriptors.notes: Use of Alcohol and mentions of Fantasy Killing and Death

short_description: Send Patrons out to quests. Use the class and element triangles to deal critical damage! Serve ale to give your patrons to give them buffs and equip them with the best weapons. Don't let your patrons die or your business will close.
